transcript.text: Shalom this is daniel john lee with tour
restoration ministries and I'm just
creating this very short YouTube to wish
everyone a very very happy Pesach very
happy passover as you can see we have
the unleavened bread which symbolizes
Joshua's body that was broken for us the
sinless perfect body just as the
unleavened bread has no leaven in it we
have the bitter herbs horseradish and
parsley symbolize the bitterness that
the bondage of sin brings to our lives
and of course we have the roasted lamb
which is Yahshua himself who gave
himself as an atonement for us to
cleanse us in his blood that we might be
free to obey Him and live a new life of
joy in him and you all have a very happy
passover when i was growing up there was
a painting on the wall of the home and
that painting said Joshua of Nazareth
cordially invites you and request the
honor of your presence to attend a
dinner to be given in the honor of his
presence well I'm off now to go have
this dinner with my friends to be given
in the honor of Yahshua HaMashiach yah
bless you all and may you have a very
happy passover and feast of unleavened
bread hawks Emmaus and Yahshua bless
Shalom
